mods.note: IRAQ Reg. No. 2827 Heliozincographed at the Survey Directorate Baghdad.SOCIETE DES NATIONS Rapport de la Commission chargee par le Conseil de I etude de la frontiere entre I’lrak et la Syrie JUILLET 1932 ANNEXE N° 1 LEAGUE OF NATIONS Report of the Commission set up by the Council to examine the frontier between Iraq and Syria JULY 1932 ANNEX No. 1

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: The map shows the area around the frontier between Iraq and Syria. It includes three red lines, which a key (in English and French) indicating that they represent the frontier determined by the Convention between the United Kingdom and France of 23 December 1920, as interpreted by the French Government, the British Government, and the Commission of Enquiry set up by the Council of the League of Nations to examine the frontier between Iraq and Syria. The map also indicates contours, hachures, and hydrology.
